name: Malware (Event Horizon School, edoardotorti, DavideProdi, Daiana Gigliotti, Mattia Radaelli, RevoP3, Perdons22, JoeAbiad, Luca Lanzellotti, Federico Simone Cao, Federico Baglivo)
name_original: Malware (Event Horizon School, edoardotorti, DavideProdi, Daiana Gigliotti, Mattia Radaelli, RevoP3, Perdons22, JoeAbiad, Luca Lanzellotti, Federico Simone Cao, Federico Baglivo)
description:
MALWARE is a fast-paced, arcade First Person Shooter where the player has to run for his life, defeating the security drones that try to stop him.

You will find yourself trapped in a prison managed by an evil AI that wants to fry your brain with MALWARE: the only chance to survive is escaping the prison.

Run, Shoot, and Pick-up weapons to enhance your damage and defeat your enemies faster; face 4 different sections (25 in the complete version of the game) packed with evil drones, and don’t forget to power up yourself in the safe zones between sections to have a higher chance of escaping.

- Please leave a comment and consider giving us a rating if you liked the demo

FEATURES!

  • FAST-PACED ARCADE EXPERIENCE
    • A First Person Shooter with a hectic arcade coin-op experience
  • WEAPONS
    • Pick up, exchange, and shoot with different powerful means of destruction
  • COMBO!
    • Pick up weapons, enhance your damage!
  • POWER-UPS 
    • Unlock power-ups, upgrade yourself
  • LEADERBOARD
    • Try your hardest to be the best and climb the ranking
  • ESCAPE FROM PRISON AS FAST AS YOU CAN 
    • Fight against time as Malware slowly uploads into your brain: when the upload is completed, it's GAME OVER

                                                            DEVELOPED BY STRANDED WHALE

                                      (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 2, 2020/2021)
